item.title: Apple Campus tour with Popular Science
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Xavier Harding, of Popular Science, and I got a private tour Apple’s new campus while under contruction. FULL ARTICLE HERE Three miles from Apple’s Cupertino, California headquarters, the tech giant is building something as massive as its own global reach: Apple’s Campus 2. The Spaceship, as many have nicknamed it, is over one mile in circumference—that’s wider […]
item.content:encoded:
Xavier Harding, of Popular Science, and I got a private tour Apple’s new campus while under contruction.

FULL ARTICLE HERE

Three miles from Apple’s Cupertino, California headquarters, the tech giant is building something as massive as its own global reach: Apple’s Campus 2. The Spaceship, as many have nicknamed it, is over one mile in circumference—that’s wider than the Pentagon. When it’s completed later this year it will house 13,000 employees—including design grandmaster Jony Ive, who helped sculpt the iPhone, and CEO Tim Cook, who helps keep profits in the “billions-with-a-B” territory.


Apple’s Glass House by PopSci

item.title: Popular Science at CES 2016
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: For CES 2016, I had the pleasure of working with the editors of Popular Science. This was their first true foray into video at CES. We got to cover everything from drones, to VR, to smart watches. Here are a collection of the videos I shot and edited.
item.content:encoded: For CES 2016, I had the pleasure of working with the editors of Popular Science. This was their first true foray into video at CES. We got to cover everything from drones, to VR, to smart watches. Here are a collection of the videos I shot and edited.

item.title: Tom Wallisch, The Verge, and GoPro
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: In a collaboration with The Verge and GoPro, I recently had the privilege to work on a project with Tom Wallisch for the ‘Top Shelf’ series. This episode highlights the advancing technology on the ski hill. Shot on location at Park City and Canyons.
item.content:encoded: In a collaboration with The Verge and GoPro, I recently had the privilege to work on a project with Tom Wallisch for the ‘Top Shelf’ series. This episode highlights the advancing technology on the ski hill. Shot on location at Park City and Canyons.

item.title: The Verge – CES2014
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: [maxgallery id=”661″]   I had the opportunity to work with one of the most popular tech journalism websites in the world – The Verge. They invited me to join their video editorial department to help with the onslaught of videos they produce during CES in Las Vegas. It was an absolute pleasure working with the […]
item.content:encoded:
[maxgallery id=”661″]

 

I had the opportunity to work with one of the most popular tech journalism websites in the world – The Verge.
They invited me to join their video editorial department to help with the onslaught of videos they produce during CES in Las Vegas.

It was an absolute pleasure working with the best tech journalists in the world. I hope to do more with them in the future.

Above are a selection of videos I cut.
